pullrequest.title: Test the simulation API using separate processes

content.raw: It seems like there's a lot of code duplication between all the different tests and examples. I always wonder if there's a way we could reduce code duplication using code generation. But without those tools, I suppose more testing is usually better, right?
content.html: It seems like there's a lot of code duplication between all the different tests and examples. I always wonder if there's a way we could reduce code duplication using code generation. But without those tools, I suppose more testing is usually better, right?
